title: Let's Make Vegetable Soup
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 1,300 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 950L
description: There's nothing better than a hot, wholesome bowl of soup on a cold or rainy day. And this book will tell you exactly how to make it! Just gather all your vegetables, spices, and other ingredients, and follow the easy steps in this book to make yummy vegetable soup. Photographs reinforce the steps in cooking.
highFrequencyWords: boil, broth, ensure, hearty, ladle, leek, Mediterranean, nutrients, simmer, strainer, tender, unique
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Alphabetizing                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
